snippet.title: Beat, Heart, Beat - Official Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
💓 Wishlist on Steam! 💓
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3239360/Beat_Heart_Beat/

👁️ Itch.io 👁️
https://tonik999.itch.io/beat-heart-beat

Beat, Heart, Beat is an autoscrolling rhythm-platformer centered around slashing through enemies to the music to maintain your momentum and traverse your way towards your own heart. Run and jump through surrealistic environments and slash enemies to traverse gaps, perform air combos, and complete tricky rhythmic patterns!

Demo Content
🎵 5 playable charts with Easy, Normal and Hard difficulties

🎵 An energetic and colorful alt-rock soundtrack!

🎵 Evocative mixed-media environments inspired by collage art

🎵 Over 5+ enemy types, each with different properties for platforming

🎵 Unique cue enemies that mix tricky rhythmic patterns right into the action

This is a demo for Beat, Heart, Beat, which will launch with many exciting new bits of content and polish. Stay tuned and enjoy the demo!
